00027 instruction::instruction() {
00028         _insType   = noType;
00029         _insStatus = noStatus;

00036         _memAddr = 0;

00039         _brTarget = 0;
00040         _missPred = true; //stay conservative in case of error
00041         _brTaken = false;
00042         _brForward = false;
00043         
00044         _executeCycle  = -1;
00045         _latency     = -1;
00046         _completeCycle = -1;
00047         _memAddrCompCompleteCycle = -1;

00049         _fetchEndCycle = -1;
00050

00057         _phraseAncestorsID = new List<int>;
00058         _brAncestors     = new List<instruction*>;
00059         _brDependents    = new List<instruction*>;
00060         _branchMode = noBrMode;
00061         _brBias = 1.0; //assume taken
00062         _brAccuracy = 0.5; //assume half way accurate
00063         _brPred = false;

00065         _inSideBuff = false;
00066         _mySBnum  = new List<int>;
00067         _causeOfSBinsID = new List<INS_ID>;

00094 instruction::~instruction() {
00095         while(_r->NumElements() > 0) {
00096             _r->RemoveAt(0);
00097         }
00098         while(_rt->NumElements() > 0) {
00099             _rt->RemoveAt(0);
00100         }
00101         while(_depPhrases->NumElements() > 0) {
00102             _depPhrases->RemoveAt(0);
00103         }
00104         while(_depFrags->NumElements() > 0) {
00105             _depFrags->RemoveAt(0);
00106         }
00107         //TODO chekc this out later
00108         //while(_dependents->NumElements() > 0) {
00109         //    _dependents->RemoveAt(0);
00110         //}
00111         delete _r;
00112         delete _pr;
00113         delete _rt;
00114         delete _dependents;
00115         delete _ancestors;
00116         delete _phraseAncestors;
00117         delete _phraseAncestorsID;
00118         delete _mySBnum;
00119         delete _causeOfSBinsID;
00120         delete _brAncestors;
00121         delete _brDependents;
00122         delete _depPhrases;
00123         delete _depFrags;
00124 }

00139 void instruction::setRegister (long int *r, int *rt) {
00140         long int tempR = *r;
00141         int tempRT = *rt;
00142         //Assert(tempR >= 1); //TODO this is remved to enable instruction injection
00143         Assert(tempRT >= READ && tempRT <= WRITE);
00144         (_r)->Append(tempR);
00145         (_rt)->Append(tempRT);
00146         if (tempRT == WRITE) _numWriteReg++;
00147         //if (debug) printf("reg = %d, type = %d\n", tempR, tempRT);
00148 }

00152         _r->RemoveAt(i);
00153         _rt->RemoveAt(i);

00171 int instruction::getNumLRFreg() {
00172         int numReg = 0;
00173         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00174                 if (_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= LARF_HI)
00175                         numReg++;
00176         }
00177         return numReg;
00178 }
00179 
00180 int instruction::getNumWrReg() {
00181         int numWrReg = 0;
00182         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00183                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE)
00184                         numWrReg++;
00185         }
00186         return numWrReg;
00187 }

00193 
00194 void instruction::setStatus (status insStatus, 
00195                             long int cycle, 
00196                             int latency) {
00197         Assert(insStatus != noStatus);
00198         _insStatus = insStatus;
00199         if (_insStatus == execute) {
00200                 _executeCycle  = cycle;
00201                 _latency     = latency;
00202                 _completeCycle = cycle + (long int)latency;
00203                 if (getType() == MEM) { //This block is used for LSQ (Naive, Store Set, etc)
00204                         Assert(latency >= ADDR_COMPUTE_LATENCY);
00205                         _memAddrCompCompleteCycle = cycle + ADDR_COMPUTE_LATENCY;
00206                 }
00207         } else if (_insStatus == fetch) {
00208                 _fetchEndCycle = cycle + FETCH_STATE_LATENCY;
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 void instruction::updateLatency(long int cycle, int latency) {
00213         Assert(_executeCycle > -1 && _executeCycle < cycle);
00214         _latency       = (latency-(ADDR_COMPUTE_LATENCY+CAM_ACCESS_LATENCY))+(cycle-_executeCycle+1);
00215         _completeCycle = _executeCycle + _latency;
00216 }
00217

00219         Assert(readORwrite >= none && readORwrite <= WRITE);
00220         _readORwrite = readORwrite;
00221 }

00299 void instruction::setAsBrAncestor(instruction* ins) {
00300         Assert(ins->getInsID() < _id);

00304 void instruction::setAsBrDependent(instruction* ins) {
00305         Assert(ins->getInsID() > _id);

00308 
00309 void instruction::delBrDependent(instruction* ins) {
00310         Assert(ins->getInsID() > _id      && 
00311                //ins->getMemType() != WRITE &&
00313                //ins->getType()    != BR    &&
00314                //ins->getType()    != ASSIGN);
00315                ins->getMemType() == READ && 
00316                ins->getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold);
00317 
00318         for (int i = _brDependents->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
00319                 if (ins->getInsID() == _brDependents->Nth(i)->getInsID() &&
00320                     ins->getType()  == _brDependents->Nth(i)->getType()) {
00321                         _brDependents->RemoveAt(i);
00322                 }
00323         }
00324 }

00362 void instruction::notifyAllDepICompleted() {
00363         for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00364                 _dependents->Nth(i)->releaseDep(this);
00365         }
00366         for (int i = 0; i < _brDependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00367                 _brDependents->Nth(i)->releaseBrDep(this);
00368         }
00369 }
00370 
00371 void instruction::notifyAllAncISquashed() {
00372         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) {
00373                 _ancestors->Nth(i)->squashDep(this);
00374                 _guardian--;
00375         }
00376         for (int i = 0; i < _brAncestors->NumElements(); i++) {
00377                 _brAncestors->Nth(i)->squashBrDep(this);
00378         }
00379 }
00380 
00381 void instruction::notifyAllDepICompleted_light() {
00382         for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00383                 _dependents->Nth(i)->releaseDep_light(this);
00384         }
00385         for (int i = 0; i < _brDependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00386                 _brDependents->Nth(i)->releaseBrDep(this);
00387         }
00388 }
00389 
00390 void instruction::notifyAllBrAncestorsICompleted() {
00391         if (getBrMode() == scheduleBr) {
00392                 for (int i = 0; i < _brAncestors->NumElements(); i++) {
00393                         _brAncestors->Nth(i)->releaseBrAncestors(this);
00394                 }
00395         }
00396 }
00397 
00398 void instruction::addDep() {
00399         _guardian++;
00400         //TODO might need upper bound assert
00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 void instruction::releaseDep_light(instruction* ins) {
00405         for (int i = _ancestors->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
00406                 if (ins->getInsID() == _ancestors->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {
00407                         _ancestors->RemoveAt(i);
00408                 }
00409         }
00410         _guardian--;
00411 }
00412 
00413 void instruction::releaseDep(instruction* ins) {
00414         for (int i = _ancestors->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
00415                 if (ins->getInsID() == _ancestors->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {
00416                         _ancestors->RemoveAt(i);
00417                 }
00418         }
00419         _guardian--;
00420         //Assert(_guardian >=0);
00421         //if ((getBrMode() == scheduleBr || getBrMode() == allBr || getBrMode() == noBr) && _ancestors->NumElements() == 0) {
00422         if ((getBrMode() == scheduleBr) && _ancestors->NumElements() == 0) {
00423                 goToReadyList();
00424                 removeFromInsMap();
00425                 //If ther is an older BR op, inject a new ins
00426                 //if (getNumBrAncestors() > 0 && getType() != BR && getMemType() != WRITE && getType() != ASSIGN && getType() != ALU) { //TODO I think this line has the bug!
00428                 //      _scheduler->injectIns(this);
00432                 //}
00433         }
00434 }
00435 
00436 void instruction::squashDep(instruction* ins) {
00437         for (int i = _dependents->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
00438                 if (ins->getInsID() == _dependents->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {
00439                         _dependents->RemoveAt(i);
00440                 }
00441         }
00442 }
00443 
00444 void instruction::releaseBrAncestors(instruction* ins) {
00445         Assert(getType() == BR);
00446         for (int i = _brDependents->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
00447                 if (ins->getInsID() == _brDependents->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {
00448                         _brDependents->RemoveAt(i);
00449                 }
00450         }
00451 }
00452 
00453 void instruction::releaseBrDep(instruction* ins) {

00455                 if (ins->getInsID() == _brAncestors->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {
00456                         _brAncestors->RemoveAt(i);
00457                 }
00458         }
00459 }

00464                 if (ins->getInsID() == _brDependents->Nth(i)->getInsID()) {

00496 bool instruction::isReady(long int cycle) {
00497         Assert(_guardian >= 0); // && 
00498                //_fetchEndCycle > 0);
00499         //printf("number of dependents = %d\n", _guardian);
00500         //if (_guardian > 0)    return false;
00501         //if (_fetchEndCycle > cycle || //TODO if you uncomment, be sure all func calls pass correct cycle val
00502         if(_ancestors->NumElements() > 0) return false;
00503         else return true;
00504 }
00505 
00506 bool instruction::isRepeated(instruction* temp, List<instruction*>*_ancestors) {
00507         Assert (temp != NULL);
00508         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++)
00509                 if (_ancestors->Nth(i)->getInsID() == temp->getInsID()) {
00510                         return true;
00511                 }
00512         return false;
00513 }
00514 
00515 bool instruction::renameRegs(registerRename *GRF, int coreType) {
00516         Assert((coreType == OUT_OF_ORDER || coreType == PHRASEBLOCK) && "The specified core type is not supported for register renaming.");
00517         //Do we have enough registers to rename?
00518         if (GRF->getNumAvailablePR() < _numWriteReg)
00519                 return true; //STALL FETCH
00520 
00521         // Process Read Refisters FIRST
00522         for (int i = 0; i < getNumReg(); i++) {
00523                 if (coreType == PHRASEBLOCK && !(_r->Nth(i) >= GARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= GARF_HI)) continue;
00524                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) {
00525                         PR p_reg = GRF->getRenamedReg(_r->Nth(i));
00526                         switch (GRF->getPRFSM(p_reg)) {
00527                                 case AVAILABLE:
00528                                         Assert(true == false && "Unexpected register state");
00529                                         //This can happen after some squashed
00530                                         break;
00531                                 case RENAMED_VALID:
00532                                         // _r->RemoveAt(i);
00533                                         // _r->InsertAt(p_reg,i); //don't have to do it
00534                                         break;
00535                                 case RENAMED_INVALID:
00536                                         //need to impose dependency here
00537                                         instruction* ancestor;
00538                                         ancestor = GRF->getWriterIns(p_reg);
00539                                         if (isRepeated(ancestor,_ancestors)==false) {
00540                                                 addDep();
00541                                                 ancestor->setAsDependent(this);
00542                                                 setAsAncestor(ancestor);
00543                                         }
00544                                         // _r->RemoveAt(i);
00545                                         // _r->InsertAt(p_reg,i); //don't have to do it
00546                                         break;
00547                                 case ARCH_REG:
00548                                         // _r->RemoveAt(i);
00549                                         // _r->InsertAt(p_reg,i); //don't have to do it
00550                                         break;
00551                                 default:
00552                                         Assert(true == false && "Invalid PR state");
00553                         };
00554                 }
00555         }
00556         // Process Write Refisters SECOND
00557         for (int i = 0; i < getNumReg(); i++) {
00558                 if (coreType == PHRASEBLOCK && !(_r->Nth(i) >= GARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= GARF_HI)) continue;
00559                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00560                         AR a_reg = _r->Nth(i);
00561                         if (GRF->isAnyPRavailable()) {
00562                                 PR old_pr = GRF->getRenamedReg(a_reg);
00563                                 PR new_pr = GRF->getAvailablePR();
00564                                 GRF->update_fRAT(a_reg,new_pr);
00565                                 GRF->setARST(new_pr,old_pr);
00566                                 GRF->updatePRFSM(new_pr,RENAMED_INVALID,this);
00567                                 _pr->Append(new_pr);
00568                                 _pTOaRegMap.insert(pair<PR,AR>(new_pr,a_reg));
00569                                 // _r->RemoveAt(i);
00570                                 // _r->InsertAt(new_pr,i); //don't have to do it
00571                         } else {
00572                                 Assert(true == false && "An avialable physical register must have been available!");
00573                         }
00574                 }
00575         }
00576         return false; //DON'T STALL FETCH
00577 }
00578 
00579 void instruction::commitRegs(registerRename *GRF) {
00580         // Process Write Refisters @complete
00581         for (int i = 0; i < _pr->NumElements(); i++) {
00582                 PR p_reg = _pr->Nth(i);
00583                 AR a_reg = _pTOaRegMap[p_reg];
00584                 Assert(_pTOaRegMap.find(p_reg) != _pTOaRegMap.end());
00585                 PR old_pr = GRF->getARST(p_reg);
00586                 GRF->updatePRFSM(p_reg,ARCH_REG);
00587                 GRF->updatePRFSM(old_pr,AVAILABLE);
00588                 GRF->update_cRAT(a_reg,p_reg);
00589                 GRF->setAsAvailablePR(old_pr);
00590                 GRF->eraseARST(p_reg);
00591         }
00592 }
00593 
00594 void instruction::completeRegs(registerRename *GRF) {
00595         // Process Write Refisters @complete
00596         for (int i = 0; i < _pr->NumElements(); i++) {
00597                 PR p_reg = _pr->Nth(i);
00598                 GRF->updatePRFSM(p_reg,RENAMED_VALID);
00599         }
00600 }
00601 
00602 void instruction::squashRenameReg(registerRename *GRF) {
00603         for (int i = 0; i < _pr->NumElements(); i++) {
00604                 PR p_reg = _pr->Nth(i);
00605                 Assert(_pTOaRegMap.find(p_reg) != _pTOaRegMap.end());
00606                 GRF->squashRAT(_pTOaRegMap[p_reg]);
00607                 GRF->squashARST(p_reg);
00608                 GRF->squashPRFSM(p_reg);
00609                 GRF->setAsAvailablePR(p_reg);
00610         }
00611 }
00612 
00613 void instruction::noRRdependencyTable (dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType) {
00614         Assert((coreType == IN_ORDER || coreType == PHRASEBLOCK) && "The specified core type is not supported for register renaming.");
00615         //Register true dependency check for all instruction types
00616         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00617                 if (coreType == PHRASEBLOCK && !(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= LARF_HI)) continue;
00618                 if (coreType == IN_ORDER    && !(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= GARF_HI)) Assert(true == false && "Invalid register value.");
00619                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) { //TODO Does this line make sense? (int vs. memType)
00620                         instruction *temp = depTables->regLookup(_r->Nth(i),REG_WRITE);//RAW
00621                         if (temp != NULL) {
00622                                 if (isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00623                                         addDep();
00624                                         temp->setAsDependent(this);
00625                                         setAsAncestor(temp);
00626                                 }
00627                         }
00628                 } else if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00629                         //only for non-OOO cores
00630                         instruction *temp = depTables->regLookup(_r->Nth(i),REG_READ);//WAR
00631                         if (temp != NULL && isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00632                                 addDep();
00633                                 temp->setAsDependent(this);
00634                                 setAsAncestor(temp);
00635                         }
00636                         temp = depTables->regLookup(_r->Nth(i),REG_WRITE);//WAW
00637                         if (temp != NULL && isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00638                                 addDep();
00639                                 temp->setAsDependent(this);
00640                                 setAsAncestor(temp);
00641                         }
00642                 }
00643         }
00644         //Update write register table (must be done last to avoid deadlock/wrong dependency)
00645         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00646                 if (coreType == PHRASEBLOCK && !(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= LARF_HI)) continue;
00647                 if (coreType == IN_ORDER    && !(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= GARF_HI)) Assert(true == false && "Invalid register value.");
00648                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00649                         depTables->addReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_WRITE); //overwrites existing table entry for reg
00650                 } else if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) { //TODO register renaming breaks this block of code
00651                         depTables->addReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_READ); //overwrites existing table entry for reg
00652                 }
00653         }
00654 }
00655 
00656 void instruction::infRegdependencyTable (dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType) {
00657         //Register true dependency check for all instruction types
00658         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00659                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) { //TODO Does this line make sense? (int vs. memType)
00660                         instruction *temp = depTables->regLookup(_r->Nth(i),REG_WRITE);//RAW
00661                         if (temp != NULL) {
00662                                 if (isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00663                                         addDep();
00664                                         temp->setAsDependent(this);
00665                                         setAsAncestor(temp);
00666                                 }
00667                         }
00668                 }
00669         }
00670         //Update write register table (must be done last to avoid deadlock/wrong dependency)
00671         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00672                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00673                         depTables->addReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_WRITE); //overwrites existing table entry for reg
00674                 }
00675         }
00676 }
00677 
00678 void instruction::totalOrder_MemDependencyTable (lsq* totalOrderLSQ) {
00679         if (getMemType() == READ && !totalOrderLSQ->isSQempty()) {
00680                 instruction* ancestor = totalOrderLSQ->getSQtail();
00681                 if (ancestor->getStatus() != complete) { //WAR and RAW
00682                         addDep();
00683                         ancestor->setAsDependent(this);
00684                         setAsAncestor(ancestor);
00685                 }
00686         } else if (getMemType() == WRITE) {
00687                 if (totalOrderLSQ->isSQfull()) {
00688                         //STALL (add code here)
00689                 } else {
00690                         if (!totalOrderLSQ->isSQempty()) {
00691                                 instruction* ancestor = totalOrderLSQ->getSQtail();
00692                                 if (ancestor->getStatus() != complete) { //WAW
00693                                         addDep();
00694                                         ancestor->setAsDependent(this);
00695                                         setAsAncestor(ancestor);
00696                                 }
00697                         }
00698                         totalOrderLSQ->pushBackSQ(this);
00699                 }
00700         }
00701 }
00702 
00703 void instruction::storeOrder_MemDependencyTable (instruction* ancestor) {
00704         //Enforce INO execution of ST operations
00705         if (ancestor == NULL) printf("empty\n");
00706         if (getMemType() == WRITE) {
00707                 if (ancestor->getStatus() != complete) { //WAW
00708                         addDep();
00709                         ancestor->setAsDependent(this);
00710                         setAsAncestor(ancestor);
00711                 }
00712         }
00713 }
00714 
00715 void instruction::br_dependencyTable (dependencyTable *depTables) {
00716         // Branch dependency check for all instruction types
00717         if (getBrMode() != noBr) {
00718         //if (getBrMode() == lowBiasBr && (getBrBias() >= 0.05 && getBrBias() <= 0.95)) {
00719                 //if (getBrMode() == lowBiasBr && (getBrBias() < 0.05 || getBrBias() > 0.95)) {
00720                 //}
00721                 List<instruction*>* brList = depTables->brLookup();
00722                 for (int i = 0; i < brList->NumElements(); i++) {
00723                         instruction *tempBr = brList->Nth(i);
00724                         if ( getBrMode() == allBr          || 
00725                              getBrMode() == dynPredBr  || 
00726                              getBrMode() == statPredBr || 
00727                             (getBrMode() == lowBiasBr) || // && (getBrBias() >= 0.05 && getBrBias() <= 0.95)) || 
00728                             (getBrMode() == scheduleBr && !(getMemType() == READ && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold))) {
00729                             //(getBrMode() == scheduleBr && (getMemType() == WRITE || getType() == BR || getType() == ASSIGN))) {// || getType() == ALU))) {
00730                                 tempBr->setAsDependent(this);
00731                                 addDep();
00732                                 setAsAncestor(tempBr);
00733                         }
00734                         setAsBrAncestor(tempBr);
00735                         tempBr->setAsBrDependent(this);
00736                 }
00737                 if (getBrMode() == statPredBr || getBrMode() == dynPredBr) {
00738                         if (getType() == BR && _missPred == true) {depTables->addBr(this);} //Static branch prediction
00739                 } else if (getBrMode() == allBr || getBrMode() == scheduleBr || (getBrMode() == lowBiasBr&& (getBrBias() >= 0.05 && getBrBias() <= 0.95))) {
00740                         if (getType() == BR) {depTables->addBr(this);} //No Static branch prediction
00741                 }
00742         }
00743 }
00744 
00745 void instruction::perfect_MemDependencyTable (dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType, int numSideBuffs) {
00746         // Dependency checck for mem instructions
00747         if (_readORwrite == READ) { //Mem Read
00748                 instruction *temp = depTables->addrLookup(_memAddr, MEM_WRITE);//RAW
00749                 if (temp != NULL && isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00750                         addDep();
00751                         temp->setAsDependent(this);
00752                         setAsAncestor(temp);
00753                         if (temp->isGotoSideBuff() == true) {
00754                                 //goToSideBuff();
00755                                 if (coreType != ONE_LEVE_DEEP_STAT) addAsMySB(temp->getSideBuffNum(),temp->getCauseOfSBinsID(),numSideBuffs);
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758                 depTables->addAddr(_memAddr, this, MEM_READ);
00759         } else if (_readORwrite == WRITE) { //Mem Write
00760                 instruction *temp = depTables->addrLookup(_memAddr, MEM_READ);//WAR
00761                 if (temp != NULL && isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00762                         addDep();
00763                         temp->setAsDependent(this);
00764                         setAsAncestor(temp);
00765                         if (temp->isGotoSideBuff() == true) {
00766                                 //goToSideBuff();
00767                                 if (coreType != ONE_LEVE_DEEP_STAT) addAsMySB(temp->getSideBuffNum(),temp->getCauseOfSBinsID(),numSideBuffs);
00768                         }
00769                 }
00770                 temp = depTables->addrLookup(_memAddr, MEM_WRITE);//WAW
00771                 if (temp != NULL && isRepeated(temp,_ancestors)==false) {
00772                         addDep();
00773                         temp->setAsDependent(this);
00774                         setAsAncestor(temp);
00775                         if (temp->isGotoSideBuff() == true) {
00776                                 //goToSideBuff();
00777                                 if (coreType != ONE_LEVE_DEEP_STAT) addAsMySB(temp->getSideBuffNum(),temp->getCauseOfSBinsID(),numSideBuffs);
00778                         }
00779                 }
00780                 depTables->addAddr(_memAddr, this, MEM_WRITE);
00781         }
00782 }
00783 
00784 void instruction::delDepTableEntris(dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType, bool perfectRegRen) {
00785         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00786                 if (perfectRegRen == false && coreType == PHRASEBLOCK && (_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= LARF_HI)) continue;
00787                 if (coreType == IN_ORDER    && !(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= GARF_HI)) Assert(true == false && "Invalid register value.");
00788                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE && (coreType == PHRASEBLOCK || coreType == IN_ORDER || perfectRegRen == true)) {
00789                         depTables->delReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_WRITE);
00790                 } else if ( _rt->Nth(i) == READ && coreType == IN_ORDER) {
00791                         depTables->delReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_READ);
00792                 }
00793         }
00794         if (_readORwrite == READ) {
00795                 depTables->delAddr(_memAddr, this, MEM_READ);
00796         } else if (_readORwrite == WRITE) {
00797                 depTables->delAddr(_memAddr, this, MEM_WRITE);
00798         }
00799 
00800         if ((getBrMode() == statPredBr || getBrMode() == dynPredBr) && (getType() == BR && _missPred == true)) {
00801                 //Static branch prediction
00802                 depTables->delBr(this);
00803         } else if ((getBrMode() == allBr || getBrMode() == scheduleBr || (getBrMode() == lowBiasBr&& (getBrBias() >= 0.05 && getBrBias() <= 0.95))) && getType() == BR) {
00804                 //No Static branch prediction
00805                 depTables->delBr(this);
00806         }
00807 }
00808 
00809 void instruction::delDepTableEntris_LRF(dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType, bool perfectRegRen) {
00810         Assert(coreType == PHRASEBLOCK);
00811         if (perfectRegRen == true) return; //don't use this func in perfectRR mode
00812         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00813                 if (!(_r->Nth(i) >= LARF_LO && _r->Nth(i) <= LARF_HI)) continue;
00814                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00815                         depTables->delReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_WRITE);
00816                 } else if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) {
00817                         depTables->delReg(_r->Nth(i), this, REG_READ);
00818                 }
00819         }
00820 }
00821 
00822 //Update the map for write-registers
00823 void instruction::updateDepTableEntris(dependencyTable *depTables, int coreType, instruction* replaceIns) {
00824         //printf("command = %s\n", _command);
00825         Assert(getMemType() == READ && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold);
00826         //Assert(getMemType() != WRITE && getType() != BR && getType() != ASSIGN); // && getType() != ALU);
00827         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
00828                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
00829                         depTables->addReg(_r->Nth(i), replaceIns, REG_WRITE);
00830                 }
00831         }
00832 }
00833 
00834 void instruction::goToSideBuff() {
00835         _inSideBuff = true;
00836 }
00837 
00838 void instruction::getOutSideBuff() {
00839         _inSideBuff = false;
00840 }
00841 
00842 bool instruction::isGotoSideBuff() {
00843         if (_mySBnum->NumElements() > 0) return true;
00844         else return false;
00845 }
00846 
00847 void instruction::addAsMySB(int sb, INS_ID causeOfSBinsID, int numSideBuffs) {
00848         Assert (sb >= 0 && sb < numSideBuffs);
00849         Assert (_mySBnum->NumElements() == _causeOfSBinsID->NumElements());
00850         if (_currentCauseOfSBinsID < causeOfSBinsID) {
00851                 _currentMySBnum = sb;
00852                 _currentCauseOfSBinsID = causeOfSBinsID;
00853         }
00854         _mySBnum->Append(sb);
00855         _causeOfSBinsID->Append(causeOfSBinsID);
00856 }
00857 
00858 void instruction::delMySB(int sb, INS_ID causeOfSBinsID, int numSideBuffs) {
00859         Assert (sb >= 0 && sb < numSideBuffs);
00860         Assert (_mySBnum->NumElements() == _causeOfSBinsID->NumElements());
00861         bool findNewVal = false;
00862         if (_currentMySBnum == sb && _currentCauseOfSBinsID == causeOfSBinsID) {
00863                 findNewVal = true;
00864                 _currentMySBnum = -1;
00865                 _currentCauseOfSBinsID = 0;
00866                 //find a new current value
00867         }
00868         for (int i = _causeOfSBinsID->NumElements()-1; i>= 0; i--) {
00869                 if (_causeOfSBinsID->Nth(i) == causeOfSBinsID && _mySBnum->Nth(i) == sb) {
00870                         //Remove the SB that just completed
00871                         _mySBnum->RemoveAt(i);
00872                         _causeOfSBinsID->RemoveAt(i);
00873                 } else if (findNewVal==true && _currentCauseOfSBinsID < _causeOfSBinsID->Nth(i)) {
00874                         //Find the youngest long lat instruction & its SB
00875                         _currentMySBnum = _mySBnum->Nth(i);
00876                         _currentCauseOfSBinsID = _causeOfSBinsID->Nth(i);
00877                 }
00878         }
00879 }
00880 
00881 void instruction::notifyAllDepGoToSideBuff(int sb, INS_ID causeOfSBinsID, int numSideBuffs) {
00882         Assert (sb >= 0 && sb < numSideBuffs);
00883 
00884         if (_addFlag != causeOfSBinsID) { //avoid infinite calls
00885                 //This guarantees the youngest long latency op set the SB of an ins in fetch state
00886                 if (_insStatus == fetch || 
00887                    (_insStatus == sideBuffer && _currentMySBnum == sb)||
00888                    //(_insStatus == complete && _currentMySBnum == sb)
00889                    (_id == causeOfSBinsID))
00890                 {
00891                         addAsMySB(sb, causeOfSBinsID, numSideBuffs);
00892                 }
00893                 for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00894                         _dependents->Nth(i)->notifyAllDepGoToSideBuff(sb,causeOfSBinsID,numSideBuffs);
00895                 }
00896                 _addFlag = causeOfSBinsID;
00897         }
00898 }
00899 
00900 long int instruction::notifyAllDepGetOutSideBuff(int sb, INS_ID causeOfSBinsID, int numSideBuffs) {
00901         Assert (sb >= 0 && sb < numSideBuffs);
00902         long int _numDepInOtherSBs = 0;
00903         if (_delFlag != causeOfSBinsID) { //avoid infinite calls
00904                 if (_insStatus == fetch) {
00905                         delMySB(sb,causeOfSBinsID,numSideBuffs);
00906                 } else if (_insStatus == sideBuffer && _currentMySBnum != sb) {
00907                         _numDepInOtherSBs++;
00908                 }
00909                 for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00910                         _numDepInOtherSBs += _dependents->Nth(i)->notifyAllDepGetOutSideBuff(sb, causeOfSBinsID,numSideBuffs);
00911                 }
00912                 _delFlag = causeOfSBinsID;
00913                 return _numDepInOtherSBs;
00914         }
00915         return 0;
00916 }
00917 
00918 int instruction::getSideBuffNum() {
00919         Assert (_currentMySBnum != -1);
00920         return _currentMySBnum;
00921 }
00922 
00923 INS_ID instruction::getCauseOfSBinsID() {
00924         Assert(_currentCauseOfSBinsID != 0);
00925         return _currentCauseOfSBinsID;
00926 }
00927 
00928 void instruction::setPiepelineLat (int pipeLineLat) {
00929         Assert (pipeLineLat > 0);
00930         _pipeLineLat = pipeLineLat;
00931 }
00932 
00933 int instruction::getPipelineLat () {
00934         Assert (_pipeLineLat != -1);
00935         return _pipeLineLat;
00936 }
00937 
00938 int instruction::findLongestPath(long int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting, long int myPhraseID) {
00939         //only access the children one, per cycle to aviud runtime performance loss
00940         if (_myPhraseID == myPhraseID) {
00941                 if (_findLPflag != (INS_ID) cycle) {
00942                         //printf ("%d - %s", getInsID(), getCmdStr());
00943                         _critPathLen = -1;
00944                         for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00945                                 int pathLength = _dependents->Nth(i)->findLongestPath(cycle, UPLDhoisting, myPhraseID);
00946                                 if (_critPathLen < pathLength) {
00947                                         _critPathLen = pathLength;
00948                                 }
00949                         }
00950                         if (_critPathLen == -1) {
00951                                 if (UPLDhoisting == true
00952                                     && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold
00953                                     && _readORwrite == READ) {
00954                                         _critPathLen = cacheLat[1];
00955                                 } else {
00956                                         _critPathLen = getPipelineLat();
00957                                 }
00958                         } else { 
00959                                 if (UPLDhoisting == true
00960                                     && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold
00961                                     && _readORwrite == READ) {
00962                                         _critPathLen += cacheLat[1];
00963                                 } else {
00964                                         _critPathLen += getPipelineLat();
00965                                 }
00966                         }
00967                         _findLPflag = cycle;
00968                 }
00969                 Assert (_findLPflag != 0 && _critPathLen > 0);
00970                 return _critPathLen;
00971         } else {
00972                 return 0;
00973         }
00974 }
00975 
00976 int instruction::findLongestPathDynamicly(long int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting) {
00977         //only access the children one, per cycle to aviud runtime performance loss
00978         if (_findLPflag != (INS_ID)cycle) {
00979                 _critPathLen = -1;
00980                 for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++) {
00981                         int pathLength = _dependents->Nth(i)->findLongestPathDynamicly(cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00982                         if (_critPathLen < pathLength) {
00983                                 _critPathLen = pathLength;
00984                         }
00985                 }
00986                 if (_critPathLen == -1) {
00987                         if (UPLDhoisting == true
00988                             && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold
00989                             && _readORwrite == READ) {
00990                                 _critPathLen = cacheLat[1];
00991                         } else {
00992                                 _critPathLen = getPipelineLat();
00993                         }
00994                 } else {
00995                         if (UPLDhoisting == true
00996                             && getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold
00997                             && _readORwrite == READ) {
00998                                 _critPathLen += cacheLat[1];
00999                         } else {
01000                                 _critPathLen += getPipelineLat();
01001                         }
01002                 }
01003                 //TODO an experiment ------------------
01004                 //if (_critPathLen < _dependents->NumElements()) {
01005                 //      //printf("%d, %d, %d\n",_id, _critPathLen,_dependents->NumElements());
01006                 //      _critPathLen = _dependents->NumElements();
01007                 //}
01008                 //TODO an experiment ------------------
01009                 _findLPflag = cycle;
01010         }
01011         Assert (_findLPflag != 0 && _critPathLen > 0);
01012         return _critPathLen;
01013 }
01014 
01015 int instruction::getLongestPath() {
01016         //if (_critPathLen == -1)
01017         //      printf ("%d - %s", getInsID(), getCmdStr());
01018         Assert(_critPathLen != -1);
01019         return _critPathLen;
01020 }
01021 
01022 //set _pathLen to the longest path of phrase
01023 void instruction::lookUpANDsetPathLen() {
01024         Assert(_pathLen == -1);
01025         //Find the max path-length of the ancestors
01026         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) { //TODO this can be made efficient (see isOnCritiPath())
01027                 if (_ancestors->Nth(i)->getMyPhraseID() == getMyPhraseID() && 
01028                     _pathLen < _ancestors->Nth(i)->getPathLen()) {
01029                         _pathLen = _ancestors->Nth(i)->getPathLen();
01030                 }
01031         }
01032         //add my own path length
01033         if (_pathLen == -1) {_pathLen = 0;}
01034         _pathLen += getMyPathLen();
01035         Assert(_pathLen > -1);
01036 }
01037 
01038 int instruction::getPathLen() {
01039         Assert(_pathLen > -1);
01040         return _pathLen;
01041 }
01042 
01043 bool instruction::isOnCritiPath(int candidatePhID) {
01044         Assert(candidatePhID > -1);
01045         int maxPathLen=-1;
01046         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) {
01047                 if (candidatePhID == _ancestors->Nth(i)->getMyPhraseID() && maxPathLen < _ancestors->Nth(i)->getPathLen()) {
01048                         maxPathLen = _ancestors->Nth(i)->getPathLen();
01049                 }
01050         }
01051         if (maxPathLen == -1) {maxPathLen = 0;}
01052         maxPathLen += getMyPathLen();
01053         int critPathThreshold = phraseSizeBound / NUM_FUNC_UNIT;
01054         if (maxPathLen > critPathThreshold) return true;
01055         else return false;
01056 }
01057 
01058 int instruction::getMyPathLen() {
01059         if (_insType == ALU) {
01060                 return ALU_LATENCY;
01061         } else if (_insType == MEM) {
01062                 return cacheLat[0];
01063         } else if (_insType == FPU) {
01064                 return FPU_LATENCY;
01065         } else if (_insType == BR) {
01066                 return ALU_LATENCY; //TODO is this a correct latency?
01067         } else if (_insType == ASSIGN) {
01068                 return ASSIGN_LATENCY; //TODO is this a correct latency?
01069         } else {
01070                 printf("ERROR: invalid instruction type.\n");
01071                 exit(1);
01072         }
01073 }
01074 
01075 void instruction::renameWriteReg(long int reg) {
01076         nextRenReg++;
01077         if (!(reg < NUM_REGISTERS && nextRenReg > INIT_RENAME_REG_NUM)) printf("cmd = %s --- %lld\n", getCmdStr(),_id);
01078         Assert(reg < NUM_REGISTERS && nextRenReg > INIT_RENAME_REG_NUM);
01079         Assert(nextRenReg > INIT_RENAME_REG_NUM);
01080         writeRegRenMap.insert(pair<long int,long int>(reg,nextRenReg));
01081 }
01082 
01083 void instruction::renameReadReg(int indx, long int renReg) {
01084         Assert(_rt->Nth(indx) == READ);
01085         int num1 = _r->NumElements();
01086         if (renReg != -1) {
01087                 _r->RemoveAt(indx);
01088                 _r->InsertAt(renReg,indx);
01089         }
01090         int num2 = _r->NumElements();
01091         Assert (num1 == num2);
01092 }
01093 
01094 long int instruction::getRenamedReg(long int reg) {
01095         if (writeRegRenMap.find(reg) != writeRegRenMap.end())
01096                 return writeRegRenMap.find(reg)->second;
01097         else
01098                 return -1; //reg is not returned
01099 }
01100 
01101 void instruction::printToFile(FILE *reScheduleFile, bool recordHitMiss) {
01102         if (_insType == ALU) {
01103                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nA,%llu,",getInsAddr());
01104                 //printf("\nA,%ld,",getInsAddr());
01105         } else if (_insType == FPU) {
01106                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nF,%llu,",getInsAddr());
01107                 //printf("\nF,%ld,",getInsAddr());
01108         } else if (_insType == BR) {
01109                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nB,%llu,%d,%ld,",getInsAddr(),_brTaken,_brTarget);
01110                 //printf("\nB,%ld,%d,%ld,",getInsAddr(),_brTaken,_brTarget);
01111         } else if (_insType == MEM && _readORwrite == READ) {
01112                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nR,%llu,%llu,",getMemAddr(),getInsAddr());
01113                 //printf("\nR,%ld,%ld,",getMemAddr(),getInsAddr());
01114         } else if (_insType == MEM && _readORwrite == WRITE) {
01115                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nW,%llu,%llu,",getMemAddr(),getInsAddr());
01116                 //printf("\nW,%ld,%ld,",getMemAddr(),getInsAddr());
01117         } else if (_insType == ASSIGN) {
01118                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "\nT,%llu,",getInsAddr());
01119                 //printf("\nT,%ld,",getInsAddr());
01120         }
01121 
01122         if (recordHitMiss == true) {
01123                 //COEFF used for conveient parsing later on
01124                 long int temp = COEFF * getMissrate();
01125                 Assert(temp <= COEFF && temp >= 0);
01126                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "%ld,", temp);
01127                 //printf("%ld,", temp);
01128                 //fprintf(reScheduleFile, "%d,", _hitLevel); //TODO remove - old version
01129                 //printf("%f | %s", getMissrate(), getCmdStr());
01130                 Assert((getMissrate() >= 0.0 && getMissrate() <= 1.0));// &&  _readORwrite == READ) ||
01131                        //(getMissrate() == 0.0 && (_readORwrite == WRITE || _insType == ALU || _insType == FPU)));
01132         }
01133 
01134         Assert(_r->NumElements() == _rt->NumElements());
01135         for (int i = 0; i < _r->NumElements(); i++) {
01136                 if (_rt->Nth(i) == READ) {
01137                         fprintf(reScheduleFile, "%ld#%d,",_r->Nth(i),_rt->Nth(i));
01138                         //printf("%ld#%d,",_r->Nth(i),_rt->Nth(i));
01139                 } else if (_rt->Nth(i) == WRITE) {
01140                         long int r = getRenamedReg(_r->Nth(i));
01141                         if (r != -1) {
01142                                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "%ld#%d,",r,_rt->Nth(i));
01143                                 //printf("%ld#%d,",r,_rt->Nth(i));
01144                         } else { 
01145                                 fprintf(reScheduleFile, "%ld#%d,",_r->Nth(i),_rt->Nth(i));
01146                                 //printf("%ld#%d,",_r->Nth(i),_rt->Nth(i));
01147                         }
01148                 }
01149         }
01150 }
01151 
01152 void instruction::findPhraseAncestors() {
01153         genPhraseAncestorsList(_id, this);
01154         //Check if 'any' of its ancestors has ever been a UPLD
01155         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) {
01156                 if (_ancestors->Nth(i)->getDepOnUPLD() == true) {
01157                         setDepOnUPLD();
01158                 }
01159         }
01160 }
01161 
01162 void instruction::genPhraseAncestorsList(int causeOfPhraseinsID, instruction* ins) {
01163         //Find the immediate UPLD ops
01164         for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) {
01165                 if (_ancestors->Nth(i)->getMemType() == READ && 
01166                     _ancestors->Nth(i)->getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold) {
01167                         addAsPhraseAncestor(_ancestors->Nth(i));
01168                 }
01169         }
01170 }
01171 
01172 //This function is for UPLD ops to realse their dependents
01173 void instruction::notifyDepICommited() {
01174         for (int i = 0; i < _dependents->NumElements(); i++)
01175                 _dependents->Nth(i)->releaseDepFromUPLD(this);
01176 }
01177 
01178 //This function is for UPLD ops to realse their dependents
01179 void instruction::releaseDepFromUPLD(instruction* ins) {
01180         for (int i = _phraseAncestors->NumElements()-1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
01181                 if (ins->getInsID() == _phraseAncestors->Nth(i)->getInsID() && ins->getMemType() == READ) {
01182                         _phraseAncestors->RemoveAt(i);
01183                         _phraseAncestorsID->RemoveAt(i);
01184                 }
01185         }
01186 }
01187 
01188 //This function is not used anywhere at the moment
01189 void instruction::genAllPhraseAncestorsList(INS_ID causeOfPhraseinsID, instruction* ins) {
01190         if (_phraseAddFlag != causeOfPhraseinsID) {
01191                 //printf("hit level = %d\n", _hitLevel);
01192                 if (getMemType() == READ && _hitLevel > 1 && _id != ins->getInsID()) {
01193                         ins->addAsPhraseAncestor(this);
01194                 }
01195                 //if (_ancestors->NumElements()==0) printf("no aestor %d\n", _id);
01196                 //else printf("yes aestor %d\n",_id);
01197                 for (int i = 0; i < _ancestors->NumElements(); i++) {
01198                         _ancestors->Nth(i)->genAllPhraseAncestorsList(causeOfPhraseinsID, ins);
01199                 }
01200                 _phraseAddFlag = causeOfPhraseinsID;
01201         }
01202         Assert(_phraseAddFlag != 0);
01203 }
01204 
01205 void instruction::addAsPhraseAncestor(instruction* ins) {
01206         Assert(ins->getMemType() == READ);
01207         //Assert(ins->getInsID() < getInsID());
01208         _phraseAncestors->Append(ins);
01209         _phraseAncestorsID->Append(ins->getInsID());
01210 }

01213         //NOTE: read the note for getNthMemRdAncestor()
01214         Assert(_phraseAncestorsID->NumElements() == _phraseAncestors->NumElements());
01215         return _phraseAncestorsID->NumElements();
01216 }

01218 instruction* instruction::getNthMemRdAncestor(int i) {
01219         //NOTE: this function can accessed anytime as opposed to getNthMemRdAncestor
01220         return _phraseAncestors->Nth(i);
01221 }

01223 int instruction::getNthMemRdAncestorID(int i) {
01224         //NOTE: this function can only be accessed only when the instruction is joining a wavefront
01225         //accessing it later (in time) may cause seg fault as the ancestors may leave ROB
01226         return _phraseAncestorsID->Nth(i);
01227 }
01228 
01229 //Only used for MEM ops. Other ops are assumed to have hitLat=-1
01230 void instruction::setCacheHitLevel(int hitLat) {
01231         Assert(getType() == MEM);
01232 
01233         //Assume a 3-level cache system
01234         if (hitLat <=  cacheLat[0])
01235                 _hitLevel = 1;
01236         else if (hitLat <=  cacheLat[1])
01237                 _hitLevel = 2;
01238         else if (hitLat <=  cacheLat[2])
01239                 _hitLevel = 3;
01240         else
01241                 _hitLevel = 4;
01242 }
01243 
01244 void instruction::importCacheHitLevel(int hitLevel) {
01245         Assert(getType() == MEM);
01246         _hitLevel = hitLevel;
01247 }
01248 
01249 
01250 int instruction::getCacheHitLevel() {
01251         return _hitLevel;
01252 }

01296 void instruction::setMissRate(double missRate) {
01297         //printf("missRate = %f\n",missRate);
01298         Assert(missRate >= 0.0 && missRate <= 1.0); 
01299         _missRate = missRate;
01300         if (getMemType() == READ && 
01301             _missRate > unpredMemOpThreshold) {
01302                 setDepOnUPLD();
01303         }
01304 }

01386 void instruction::findMissPrediction(bool missPred) {
01387         if (getBrMode() == dynPredBr) { //dynamic pred
01388                 _missPred = missPred;
01389         } else { //static pred
01390                 if ((_brForward == true  && _brTaken == true) ||
01391                     (_brForward == false && _brTaken == false)) {
01392                         _missPred = true; //Static predictor failed
01393                 } else {
01394                         _missPred = false;//Correct prediction
01395                 }
01396         }
01397 }
01398 
01399 bool instruction::getMissPrediction() {
01400         return _missPred;
01401 }

01403 void instruction::setPrediction(bool brPred) {
01404         Assert(getBrMode() == dynPredBr && "wrong usage of the function");
01405         Assert(getType() == BR);
01406         _brPred = brPred;
01407 }
01408 
01409 bool instruction::getPrediction() {
01410         Assert(getBrMode() == dynPredBr && "wrong usage of the function");
01411         Assert(getType() == BR);
01412         return _brPred;
01413 }
